caption: Percussion
comment: Good energy from the battery. Some timing issues in the opener between the snares and tenors. Keep the feet clean. Cymbal line has great presence.

caption: Guard
comment: Rifle work is clean and effective. Good staging. Work on synchronizing tosses across the line. Some dropped equipment in the closer.

caption: Music
comment: Intonation in the brass was an issue on sustained chords. Woodwinds have a nice lyrical quality. Watch the balance, low brass is getting buried.

caption: Visual
comment: The drill is well-designed and creates some great pictures. Phasing issues on the cross-to-cross move. Focus on maintaining spacing in the closer.
